name: @porsche-design-system/js
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:components-manager-core && yarn build:components-manager-cli && yarn build:components-wrapper && yarn build:partials && yarn build:app && yarn build:cleanEnvironment
scripts.build:app: yarn build:app:base && yarn build:app:components && yarn build:app:assets && yarn build:app:shared && yarn build:app:componentsAngularReact
scripts.build:components-wrapper: yarn build:components-wrapper:environment && yarn build:components-wrapper:webpack && yarn build:components-wrapper:cm && yarn build:components-wrapper:replaceCdnBaseUrlDynamicPlaceholder && yarn build:components-wrapper:generateChunksManifest
scripts.replace:initialStyles: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_INITIAL_STYLES-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getInitialStyles({prefix: "my-prefix", theme: "dark"}))') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" public/index.html > public/index.tmp.html && rm public/index.html && mv public/index.tmp.html public/index.html
scripts.replace:fontLatin: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_FONT_LATIN-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getFontLinks({ weights: ["thin", "regular", "semi-bold", "bold"] }).replace(/https:\/\/cdn\.ui\.porsche\.com\/porsche-design-system/g, "http://localhost:3001"))') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" public/index.html > public/index.tmp.html && rm public/index.html && mv public/index.tmp.html public/index.html
scripts.test:unit: yarn test:unit:components-manager-core && yarn test:unit:components-js && yarn test:unit:partials
scripts.clean:build: yarn clean:app:build && yarn clean:components-wrapper:build && yarn clean:components-manager-core:build && yarn clean:components-manager-cli:build && yarn clean:partials:build
scripts.clean:node_modules: yarn clean:app:node_modules && yarn clean:components-wrapper:node_modules && yarn clean:components-manager-core:node_modules && yarn clean:components-manager-cli:node_modules && yarn clean:partials:node_modules
